title: Vice President Biden hosts conference calls with governors and local officials to discuss recovery act implementation, 7-17-09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




July 17, 2009

 



Vice President Biden hosts conference calls with governors and local officials to discuss recovery act implementation, 7-17-09




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Vice President  ________________________________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                                                       July 17, 2009 VICE PRESIDENT BIDEN HOSTS CONFERENCE CALLS WITH  GOVERNORS AND LOCAL OFFICIALS TO DISCUSS RECOVERY ACT IMPLEMENTATION  Earlier today, the Vice President hosted two conference calls with Governors and Mayors/County Executives from across the country to discuss implementation of the Recovery Act. The following elected officials participated: GOVERNORS:  Governor Jim Doyle (D-WI) Governor Dave Freudenthal (D-WY) Governor John Hoeven (R-ND) Governor Bobby Jindal (R-LA) Governor Brian Schweitzer (D-MT)  MAYORS / COUNTY EXECUTIVES:  Mayor Terry Bellamy (D – Asheville, NC) Mayor Carl Brewer (D – Wichita, KS) Mayor Dave Munson (R – Sioux Falls, SD) Mayor Claude Ramsey (R – Hamilton County, TN)
